body.name: Stainless Steel thermo Bottles with cup 700ml/23.6oz Vacuum Insulated Bottle for hot and cold coffee drink water thermo flask with cup.(Purple,700ml)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 28 mins
features: Good Choice:We sell vacuum insulated bottle with capacity of 700ml/23.6oz,4 different colors,Suitable for everyone,and can keep hot and cold liquids for about 12 hours,I am sure you will find what you need.

High-Quality:The inner liner of this double-layer vacuum thermo bottle is made of 18/8 stainless steel.The outlet valve uses food-grade silica gel.The good material ensures a longer service life of the product,Performs better in terms of oxidation resistance and corrosion resistance,and avoids the peculiar smell of the drink.

Convenient Multi-purpose Lid:Insulated Bottles are new screw top design,leak proof,So you can put it in your backpack without worrying about any spillage.The wide mouth of the Vacuum Bottle makes it easy to pour into a serving cup,replaces many single use plastic water cup,Which is suitable for more scenes.

Easy to carry:Our stainless steel water bottle is very suitable for daily use and can be taken with you,Such as Hiking,Biking,Beach,Camping,Travel,School or company,Put the portable hot drink cup in the side pocket of your backpack or as a daily companion to help you stay healthy and hydrated.
Perfect Gifts:It is a good choice to express your care for friends and family with beautiful and practical gifts,Perfect gift for birthday,Christmas, Anniversary or other celebrations.
Satisfactory Customer Service:If you are not satisfied with our products or have any quality problems,Please feel free to contact us and we will provide you with the corresponding solutions.
body.description: Overall features and advantages: Stainless steel double wall vacuum bottle.Lightweight and 100% leakproof.Cup lid can be used as a cup.Press out water,Drink anytime anywhere.Wide mouth,easy to clean inside.Keep warm for 12 hours,Keep cold for 12 hours.Nylon lifting rope for easy carrying. Maintenance and Care: When loading liquid, make sure that the lid of the cup is tightened to prevent water leakage.Do not load corrosive liquids or strong acid liquids.After use, please wash it with clean water, and store it after natural air-drying to prevent rust and affect its service life.Use soft cleaning utensils such as cup brushes and sponges.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GIOGD Vacuum insulation bottle has an absolutely convincing inner quality that will enrich your daily life.

Stainless steel thermo bottle insulation vacuum bottle with cup. Capacity & Specifications Colour: White,Pink,Purple,Black Size: Capacity:700ml/23.6oz Size:9.9in x 3.0in x 3.0in Overall features and advantages: Stainless steel double wall vacuum bottle.Lightweight and 100% leakproof.Cup lid can be used as a cup.Press out water,Drink anytime anywhere.Wide mouth,easy to clean inside.Keep warm for 12 hours,Keep cold for 12 hours.Nylon lifting rope for easy carrying. Maintenance and Care: When loading liquid, make sure that the lid of the cup is tightened to prevent water leakage.Do not load corrosive liquids or strong acid liquids.After use, please wash it with clean water, and store it after natural air-drying to prevent rust and affect its service life.Use soft cleaning utensils such as cup brushes and sponges.

Good Material Insulated bottle liner material using 304 (18/8) Stainless steel manufacturing.The vacuum bottle is made of high quality double-layer stainless steel,It is very strong,durable,rust-proof.Keep drinks will stay temperature,pure,natural,and odor free. Good Details The bottle cap can be used as a service cup.The leak-proof screw top cover can avoid accidental overflow.The bottle mouth has a large diameter and is easy to Cleaning.Food-grade silicone water pump,Press out water, clean and use convenient. Good Design Four colors to choose from.700ml/23.6oz large capacity to meet demand.Cup body size suitable for backpack,car cup holder,cup lid with silicone handle,use a wider range of scenarios.
Perfect Gift Thermo bottles in various colors can be given to Neighbors,Fathers,Mothers,Friends,Sisters as unusual creative gifts,Birthday gifts,and Christmas gifts.All gift choices!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth my money.
reviews.reviewText: I work 8 hr shift and it last me until I get off work, It was still warm. Leak proof and comfortable size. Definitely, buy it. No doubt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thermos is so pretty and cute love the control spout thing it comes with although I do just use this to keep water warm for my daughters formula in the middle of the night ! It doesn’t stay hot past 8 hours I would say BUT I don’t need it to stay hot for that long so if you’re looking for a 4 hour heated drink this one is it! Aside from that I love it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hot beverages stay hot for the longest time it’s great. The only thing I did not like is where the lid is when you try to take a drink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this thermos. It keeps my hot tea hot forever. Easy to clean. My favorite future that it has an inner strainer that keeps the tea or anything else inside. I also like the cup from the top for drinking my tea. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We shall see (continued)
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: As you can see this is a mess. There is no way the glue can be removed without damaging the lanyard.This item is exactly what needed. It replaced a cheap bottle that couldn't keep cold/ hot liquids so for even 2 hours. I have not tested yet. Will update later. The lanyard (photo) was wrapped around with a glue layer and large thick band. Total overkill. I don't know if I can remove the glue without tearing the cloth. I'll get back to you on that as well.UPDATEThe vendor refunded my money and allowed me to keep. I can honestly state it keeps hot for almost 5 hours which is plenty of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The wrist band is ugly and useless. Fortunately, I don’t need a wrist band. Thermos works well. I recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mala calidad del articulo, el café solo lleva dos horas y ya está frío.
reviews.reviewText: El artículo no cumplió mis expectativas, el líquido caliente no lleva dos horas y ya está completamente frío no es lo que dise la reseña, lo caliente dura 24 horas ,es mentira.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this product to keep water hot for the baby's bottle. I thought it would keep the water hot for atleast 24hours as explained on the label but it stays hot for atleast 10hours before turning warm. still useful
Amazing at keeping drinks hot! No leaks Love the look. Just like the picture.
everything is fine, but it only keeps my coffee hot for for an hour or 2
